integration_points: Configures system for UK English usage
notes: This module configures the system for British English usage, setting UTC timezone, en_GB.UTF-8 locale, UK console keymap, and GB X11 keyboard layout. These settings affect time display, number formatting, date formats, and keyboard input.
reasoning: Localization is crucial for user experience; this module standardizes British English settings across systems. UTC timezone is chosen for server consistency, while UK-specific formats ensure proper display of dates, times, and monetary values.
